name: CAUSELESS HAPPINESS ORGANISATION

address: Cbr Complex Near Laxminagar Metro Station Delhi

briefDescription: Causeless Foundation is committed to conducting our programs and operations in a manner that keeps children safe and protects them from harm. We insist on 100% accountability for safeguarding the children we are privileged enough to serve. All Causeless Foundation representatives—including employees, board members, partners and volunteers—are expected to conduct themselves according to this commitment. We have clear procedures to prevent, report and respond to any risks to children. No matter the challenge, we always put children first in everything we do. Ensuring their safety and well-being is a promise we make to them and our supporters alike.
